name: @streamr-contracts/hub-subgraph
description: Subgraph definitions for the hub contracts

scripts.build: ./copyAbisFromContractsPackage.sh && npm run codegen && npm run graphbuild
scripts.docker:build: npm run build && docker build . -t streamr/deploy-hub-subgraph:dev
scripts.deploy-docker-dev: graph deploy streamr-dev/hub-subgraph --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://streamr-dev-ipfs:5001 --node http://streamr-dev-thegraph-node:8020
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy streamr-dev/hub-subgraph --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020
scripts.redeploy-local: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run create-local && npm run deploy-local
